metadata.Title: CVE-2017-15045 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.Description: LAME 3.99, 3.99.1, 3.99.2, 3.99.3, 3.99.4, 3.99.5, 3.98.4, 3.98.2 and 3.98 has a heap-based buffer over-read in fill_buffer in libmp3lame/util.c, related to lame_encode_buffer_sample_t in libmp3lame/lame.c, a different vulnerability than CVE-2017-9410. It was discovered that LAME incorrectly handled certain audio files. An attacker could possibly use this issue to cause a denial of service or possibly other unspecified impact.

criterions.comment: lame package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.100-2').
